title: 4C/ID Model-Based Program for Enhancing Science Problem-Solving Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Focusing on developing science teaching competencies applicable to elementary education settings in asynchronous learning environments utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: The four core elements of the 4C/ID model (learning tasks, supportive information, part-task practice, coaching) can be applied to actual science instruction design.
Transfer of learning skills can be improved by over 20% during the experimental design and data analysis process.
Develop science teaching-learning materials applicable in real elementary education settings through project-based assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
